00058 class EccProvider : public ThreadSafeProvider
00059 {
00060     public:
00061         typedef ThreadSafeProvider Base;
00063         EccProvider();
00065         virtual ~EccProvider();
00067         virtual INT GetProviderId() const;
00069         void Init(SimAuxHandler * aux_handler, Protector * protector);
00071         virtual INT RowCount();
00073         virtual BOOLEAN GetDataItem(INT columnid, INT row, DataItem & item);
00075         virtual BOOLEAN Update(ProviderListener * listener = 0);
00076 
00077         BOOLEAN IsEccCode(const WString & checkstr);
00078 
00079         EccCategory GetEccCategory(const WString & checkstr);
00080 
00081         void SetEccNetworkArray(const EccNetworkArray & eccarray);
00082 
00083     private:
00084         INT GetNoOfBuiltinEccCodes();
00085         BOOLEAN FillCustomizedEccs();
00086 
00087         void GetNetworkEcc(INT idx, WString & eccstr, UINT8 & ecccategory);
00088         INT GetNoOfNetworkEccs() { return m_networkarray.m_number; }
00089 
00090         SimAuxHandler * m_aux_handler;
00091         EccNetworkArray m_networkarray;
00092 
00093         WString         m_actual_cust_codes[c_max_customizable_codes];
00094         INT             m_noofcustomizedcodes;
00095 
00096 };

00102 #if defined(APOXI_ENABLE_ECC_CUSTOMIZATION)
00103 
00110 
00111 enum EccSimValidity {
00113     EccNotValid = 0x00,                                         // no bit set
00115     EccValidSimNotPresent = MSAP_ECC_SIM_NOT_PRES,              // bit 0 set
00117     EccValidSimPresent = MSAP_ECC_SIM_PRES,                     // bit 1 set
00119     EccValidAlways  = MSAP_ECC_SIM_PRES | MSAP_ECC_SIM_NOT_PRES // bit 0 and 1 set
00120 };
00121 
00123 class EccCustomization
00124 {
00125     public:
00126         EccCustomization();
00127         ~EccCustomization();
00128 
00131         BOOLEAN AddEccCode(const WString & ecccode, EccSimValidity validity);
00132 
00139         BOOLEAN SetEccVector(INT bufferlen, const UINT8 * buffer);
00140 
00142         BOOLEAN Clear();
00143 
00146         BOOLEAN Commit(BOOLEAN dont_use_hardcoded_eccs);
00147 
00148     // Gets the ECC as WString
00149         BOOLEAN GetEcc(INT idx, WString & ecc);
00150     // Gets the EccSimValidity
00151         EccSimValidity GetEccSimValidity(INT idx);
00152     // Gets the overall number of set m_noofcodes
00153         INT GetNoOfCodes() { return m_codes.len; }
00154     // Shall be hardcoded eccs be used
00155         BOOLEAN AreHardcodedEccsUsed() { return ! m_dont_use_hardcoded_eccs; }
00156     
00157     private:
00158         T_ECC_CUST_LIST m_codes;
00159         BOOLEAN         m_dont_use_hardcoded_eccs;
00160 };
